input.sentences: the kids are learning on the computer .
boy is putting his computer in his book bag .
kids on stage in a play .
output.sentences: In a small school in the Phillipines, students are given computers.
The boys and girls are quite happy.
Each day, the students pack up their computers before they go home.
On special days, they even take their computers to assemblies.
During those days, the learn of the culture of their island.
